controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    The UserController class controls what User's can do to other User-related options

        public void addUser(java.lang.String type,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Creates a User entity of either type Attendee or Organizer
        Parameters:
        type - The desired type for the User; can be Attendee or Organizer
        name - The desired name for the User.
        username - The desired username for the User.
        password - The desired password for the User.
